title: RGC: Radio Galaxy Classifier - A Python Package
description: A Python package for processing and classifying radio galaxy images 📡🧠. The acronym also pays tribute to Radha Govinda Chandra 🔭, a pioneering variable star observer.

title: Mir Sazzat Hossain | Personal Website
description: My personal website, built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Contentlayer, and 🚀 deployed on Vercel 🔼

title: Restaurant Order Prediction Using USTGCN
description: Real-time food order prediction using Unified Spatio-Temporal Graph Convolutional Network (USTGCN). 🍴🚀

title: Astro Labeller: A web application for labelling astronomical images
description: A Django based web application for colaborative labelling of astronomical images into different categories. 🌟🌠

title: Spotify Playing Now: A card for showing your currently playing Spotify song
description: A card for showing your currently playing Spotify song on your GitHub profile README or other markdown file. 🎵🎶

title: Food Judge: A social media platform for foodies
description: A social media platform for foodies to find restaurants, share their experiences, and easily connect with other foodies. 🍴🚀

title: SPMS: A web basde student performance monitoring system
description: A Django based web application for monitoring student performance based on their attendance, grades, and other metrics. 👨🏻‍🎓🧠

title: HAMS: Appointments management system for hospitals
description: A web application for managing patient records, scheduling doctor appointments, and managing hospital resources. 🏥👩🏻‍⚕️

title: Website for a local pizza shop - Pizza Roma
description: A website built in Django for a local pizza shop to showcase their menu and take orders online. 🍕🍕

title: A web application for inventory management of a local bookstore
description: A web application built in Django for managing inventory of a local bookstore and taking orders online. 📚📚

title: A simple e-commerce marketplace built using vanilla javascript
description: A e-commerce marketplace with a shopping cart built using vanilla javascript. 🛒🛍

title: CSMS: Online car showroom management system for car dealers
description: A web application for managing a car showroom, including inventory, appointments, and other resources. 🚗🚙
